title: 1.1 Introduction
description:
Islamic Finance Podcast

Welcome to Season 1, Episode 1. of newly recorded Islamic finance podcast (hence the numbering 1.1 in the title)

In this episode we examine ideas that impact our economy and financial system on the basis of justice, values and ethical principles.

Connect with us:

Be part of the conversation and keep in touch with us to find out about new episodes and other content.

Web: www.islamicfinancepodcast.com

Social media:

- YouTube

- Facebook (public page)

- Facebook (group)

- Twitter

- Instagram

 

References:

AAOIFI: Code of Ethics for Islamic Finance Professionals
